Headline: Delays at Linden Affecting Purple Line Service
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are experiencing a delay at Linden: due to signal problems. Update to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are experiencing a delay at Linden: due to signal problems.

Shuttle busses have been requested from Linden to Howard to provide connecting service through the affected area.  At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Updates will be posted as new information becomes available.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Delays, Limited Service Between Howard and Central
ShortDescription: Purple Line service experiencing delays due to signal problems at Linden; limited service via train shuttle available btwn Howard & Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are experiencing delays to due signal problems at Linden.

As a result,  Shuttle trains are operating as follow:

  • between Central and Howard on the Linden bound tracks.

: Bus shuttles are also available from Howard to  Linden to help make connections in both directions.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
